channel.title: Making it so when an NPC attacks you, you teleport somewhere?
channel.description: How would I make it so when an NPC attacks you, you teleport somewhere? If it's possible :P

item.title: Making it so when an NPC attacks you, you teleport somewhere?
item.dc:creator: @daone8 daone8
item.description:
@daone8 wrote:

You know how in Monkey madness whenever those monkey’s guarding the jail where you need to pickpocket out of there if they catch you and attack you, you get knocked out and teleported back into the cage. How would I make it like that, but for the Monkey Archer’s?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2009, 02:59:01 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2009, 06:51:53 am[/size][hr]Please?

Read full topic
